phrases: Hey, all you viewers out there!
When you are watching Fairy Tail keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen, okay?
A world where magic is an integral part of people's lives.
What we will be presenting to you today is a very eerie magic...
For the next 30 minutes your mind will leave your body and head deep into this magic...
That is right, we can do it!
Let us go for even more who-knows-what!!
The door to mystery is right in front of us
This excitement gets my heart racing
Why cannot I see tomorrow, I wonder?
The only part leveling up is my curiosity
We cannot just throw away our daily life together, right?
Living itself will be our training!
Let us search for even more who-knows-what!
We cannot be satisfied with just the normal answers
We will do our best living our life
Did you have a little swim in the ocean?
It was not that kind of trip.
He had some kind of council something-or-other meeting, or whatever...
He is been gone since yesterday.
None of that until gramps gets back!
We can put off staring into the gates of hell for a while longer!
Tell me what that is already!
I want to know so bad!
It is even scarier when I do not know what it is!
It should not be long now.
When the master returns, I will immediately ask for his decision.
Going on an S class quest without permission is against the rules, period.
And what consequences should I be prepared for, exactly?!
It is one thing for Natsu and Gray to experience that, but for Lucy-chan it is just...
Whaddaya mean, It is one thing for?
Do not lump me in with Natsu!
And what do you mean by that, huh?
You just do not take a hint, do you?
A man takes responsibility for his actions.
Why was not I put into the it is one thing for list?
And what is this experience anyway?!
I went with Natsu after all.
Why are you so scared of me?
This is not the time or place!
Please figure out what this writing means.
If you figure it out, I will present you with 500,000 jewel.
Figure out the meaning of some writing?
That is a rare kind of request.
Wait, is not this ancient writing?
Who the heck could read that?
But there is a transliteration next to it into modern characters.
I do not get this at all!
So, some people get so terrified of punishment they will sprout rainbows?
I do not think that is it...
My whole body is way too cold!
My chest area is like really, really heavy!
You are speaking way lower than usual...
Why was I on the ground?
Why did you run away when you saw my face?
T-They are acting different than normal...
What in the world is all this ruckus?
And man, why is it so dark in here?
I have got two neato boobs stuck to my chest!
What is the reason for this cat form?
Wait... I truly am a cat!
I do not remember requiping this!
Sheesh, I cannot drink in peace.
What in the world is going on?
And why is there someone here that looks just like me?
Our minds and bodies have... switched places!
And worst of all, Happy and I have switched places!
What do you mean, worst of all?
When you read that spell, the people nearby swap minds.
What the hell have you done?
All I did was try and read the request a little!
And would someone turn on the lights?!
It is not just your minds that swap...
It is like there is boiling magma in my stomach...
Hey, how about you and I go out for dinner sometime?
If you do not undo the spell within 30 minutes of activation...
You will never be able to return to normal.
How long has it been since then?
What is the spell to return us to normal?
Well, it is an ancient magic...
When it comes to something this old...
And I was so looking forward to punishing you for going on that S class quest...
That is out of the question now!
I am going to do it!
Since that is Gray in there, he still has his stripping fetish.
What has happened to my pride as an S class wizard?
I wanted to show people some cool armor, but this...
It is true we have swapped techniques, but now we are all crappy at them!
The dude that is inside'i am.
Do not call me the dude inside him!
What kind of magic is it?
I just feel sort of hazy...
What is with this nervous feeling?!
So this is what it is like to fly!
Wait, this is no time to be impressed!
We do not have time to spare!
What in the world should we do?
Ice is coming out of your mouth.
Gear here, we will make sure to turn you back to normal!
So without further ado, do it, Levy!
In other words, Levy is going to handle it herself.
I will do my best for you, Lu-chan!
I want to be the first person to read your novel,'kay, Lu-chan?
I know a thing or two about ancient writing.
So first thing to do is examine the request carefully.
We do not have any time!
Anyway, let us trust this to Levy!
Why am I eating a fish?
You can read the words safely, Levy?
It is safe to read the ancient spell writing as long as it is not read in order.
I could not stand being like this forever!
Well, I kind of like this.
So from now on I will exist as an odd winged cat?
Will I never be able to go out on a date again?
I want to switch bodies, too!
Yeah, yeah, you are Macao's son all right.
Guess it is time to prepare for the worst.
So they are nothing but a cheering squad?
What will we do if we stay like this forever?
What do you mean, what will we do?
You intend to go out and do jobs like this?
Well if we do not turn back, what choice do we have?
Since no one'll know if I do not talk.
It is not like ice is coming out of my mouth'because I want it to!
What is the matter Gray... I mean, Lucy?
All of our skills have gotten really crappy now.
Even if we go out on a job, we could not do it right!
The weakest team in all of Fairy Tail!
Flying in the sky is a lot of fun!
When you put it that way, we are screwed!
Why could not I realize this basic fact earlier?
It must be because I have turned into a cat...
What were you just trying to do, Erza?
She said something awful to me, so I wanted to say I am out of here!
But I do not have wings...
I do not have wings so I fell!
I am begging you, remove yourself-
You can undo the spell, right?
With this eternal swapping, may you be forever happy.
With this eternal swapping, may you be forever happy.
I means that the people who have swapped bodies will live together in happiness for eternity!
Ah, I am so glad I figured it out.
Wait, does not that mean we will stay like this?!
So you only figured out what the request said, Levy?
Levy-chan, we have got to undo the magic!
You know, like a hidden meaning or something!
Okay, I will do my best!
Is not that cheering squad making things worse?
I am going to join them!
I cannot see any extra meaning this way...
It is not even making words!
Fish, from now on, every day...
Fish in the morning, fish at noon, fish at night...
Now that I am a cat, is that what will be my happiness?
We should not be fighting now, right?
Oh we are in trouble now...
We are at the one minute mark!
You have been really damn amused by this!
I feel like I am close...
Gramps, do not you remember anything?
We are not going to make it!
I told you, anything but that!
I am not sure how accurate this is, but 40 seconds to go!
When undoing this magic, I think you can only do it one pair at a time.
It is impossible to do everyone at once.
What will happen to Fairy Tail if I stay like this?
Happy and I will go first!
I do not mind one way or the other.
People are scary creatures when cornered...
Levy, save the explaining for later!
If you are back to normal, stop that!
The words by themselves did not have any extra meaning.
So I tried reading them backwards.
There are not many characters in ancient writing,
so in order to express extra meaning, reading them backwards can activate a different effect.
When I read the spell in the opposite direction, the magic was lifted!
I do not care one way or the other, though.
Too bad, but it seems the other two did not make it under the time limit.
Maybe I did not say it exactly right...
Then I will be stuck like this forever?
I do not want to be drooling flames forever!
Although I do not care either way!
I am sure there is got to be some other way.
Now this is one nice body!
Men do not quit, got that Natsu?
Whoa, I am getting drunk real quick...
Not that it matters with you two.
This nice body is like a dream come true!
I think this is out of my league.
This is not something to be happy about!
This magic is not a fantasy.
It is a magic that slightly upsets the balance of one's everyday existence...
And with that, until next time.
You are just going to end it?!
chasing after your profile left only in my revolving dreams
You said, I never want to see your face again, when you left me
But the tears on your cheek said it all
Every time you felt like you would be swallowed up in the waves of contradiction
you always held back your tears, you know?
What a strong person, they said, but everyone overestimated you
and before you knew it you lost sight of who you really are
Then the sun I thought would always be near me collapsed
Rubbing out the truths and the lies of one day, altogether
still, ironically, chasing after your profile in my revolving dreams
Today we will be introducing all the people at Fairy Tail - Part 2!
The wizards in the guild pick whatever requests they want from the board and go do the jobs.
Form a team with someone you are compatible with, and let us go out on an adventure!
Erza was all panicking when she turned into you, Happy!
And her flying skills needed work.
Makes me think of the time you were born, Happy.
But it was Erza on the inside, so she could not be 90 as cute as me.
Next time: Natsu and the Dragon Egg!
Well, you were a bit gross right when you were born, Happy.
But I am sure I was cute!
One of those cute'n gross things.
